## Vector2.scale() method

Returns a new Vector2 scaled by "scale" from the current Vector2

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scale(scale: number): Vector2;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | defines the scaling factor |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector2`

a new Vector2
